person.persName: John J. Hawes (Louisville, KY, attorney, judge advocate + capt. 1st Ky Lt.Art.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, attorney, judge advocate, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John W. Hawes and Lydia Hawes. Student in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Louisville in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) as lieutenant and captain from June 17, 1863, to January 20, 1865. Served as a judge advocate for military commission at Lexington, Kentucky, from June 20, 1864, to January 20, 1865.
